caption.center: STEVE BRISTOL TAYLOR, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from the Circuit Court for Hamilton County. John W. Peach, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Steve Bristol Taylor, pro se, Appellant.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, Tallahassee, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
VAN NORTWICK and PADOVANO, JJ., LAWRENCE, JR., L. ARTHUR, SENIOR JUDGE, CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED.Page 610
